channel.title: I need help with highscores. Rep ++
channel.description:
This highscores is from imsuperman05.
This is what I have, I tweaked it a little bit from what it was. [code]
private static synchronized void saveHiscores(final Client c) { try { int overallLVL = 0; double overallXP = 0; for (int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { overallLVL += c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[i]); overallXP += c.playerXP[i]; } if(c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3 || c.playerRights == 6) { System.out.println(c.playerName+" is a admin or owner and has not"); System.out.println("been saved."); return; } HiscoresHandler .getConnection() .createStatement() .execute( ("INSERT INTO `skills` (`playerName`,`Attacklvl`,`Attackxp`,`Defencelvl`,`Defencexp`,`Strengthlvl`,`Strengthxp`,`Hitpointslvl`,`Hitpointsxp`,`Rangelvl`,`Rangexp`,`Prayerlvl`,`Prayerxp`,`Magiclvl`,`Magicxp`,`Cookinglvl`,`Cookingxp`,`Woodcuttinglvl`,`Woodcuttingxp`,`Fletchinglvl`,`Fletchingxp`,`Fishinglvl`,`Fishingxp`,`Firemakinglvl`,`Firemakingxp`,`Craftinglvl`,`Craftingxp`,`Smithinglvl`,`Smithingxp`,`Mininglvl`,`Miningxp`,`Herblorelvl`,`Herblorexp`,`Agilitylvl`,`Agilityxp`,`Thievinglvl`,`Thievingxp`,`Slayerlvl`,`Slayerxp`,`Farminglvl`,`Farmingxp`,`Runecraftlvl`,`Runecraftxp`) VALUES ('"+c.playerName+"',"+c.playerLevel[0]+","+c.playerXP[0]+","+c.playerLevel[1]+","+c.playerXP[1]+","+c.playerLevel[2]+","+c.playerXP[2]+","+c.playerLevel[3]+","+c.playerXP[3]+","+c.playerLevel[4]+","+c.playerXP[4]+","+c.playerLevel[5]+","+c.playerXP[5]+","+c.playerLevel[6]+","+c.playerXP[6]+","+c.playerLevel[7]+","+c.playerXP[7]+","+c.playerLevel[8]+","+c.playerXP[8]+","+c.playerLevel[9]+","+c.playerXP[9]+","+c.playerLevel[10]+","+c.playerXP[10]+","+c.playerLevel[11]+","+c.playerXP[11]+","+c.playerLevel[12]+","+c.playerXP[12]+","+c.playerLevel[13]+","+c.playerXP[13]+","+c.playerLevel[14]+","+c.playerXP[14]+","+c.playerLevel[15]+","+c.playerXP[15]+","+c.playerLevel[16]+","+c.playerXP[16]+","+c.playerLevel[17]+","+c.playerXP[17]+","+c.playerLevel[18]+","+c.playerXP[18]+","+c.playerLevel[19]+","+c.playerXP[19]+","+c.playerLevel[20]+","+c.playerXP[20]+")")); HiscoresHandler .getConnection() .createStatement() .execute( ("INSERT INTO `skillsoverall` (`playerName`,`lvl`,`xp`) VALUES ('"+c.playerName+"',"+(c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[7]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[8]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[9]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[10]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[11]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[12]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[13]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[14]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[15]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[16]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[17]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[18]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[19]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[20]))+","+((c.playerXP[0]) + (c.playerXP[1]) + (c.playerXP[2]) + (c.playerXP[3]) + (c.playerXP[4]) + (c.playerXP[5]) + (c.playerXP[6]) + (c.playerXP[7]) + (c.playerXP[8]) + (c.playerXP[9]) + (c.playerXP[10]) + (c.playerXP[11]) + (c.playerXP[12]) + (c.playerXP[13]) + (c.playerXP[14]) + (c.playerXP[15]) + (c.playerXP[16]) + (c.playerXP[17]) + (c.playerXP[18]) + (c.playerXP[19]) + (c.playerXP[20]))));
} catch (final Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); } } [/code]
For some reason when a player that's already been updated to the highscores it shows: [code] [11/6/11 5:31 PM]: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.MySQLIntegrityConstraintViola tionException: Duplicate entry 'dark sait' for key 'PRIMARY' [11/6/11 5:31 PM]: at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance 0(Native Method) [11/6/11 5:31 PM]: at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance (NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.java:39) [11/6/11 5:31 PM]: at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInst ance(DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.java:27) [11/6/11 5:31 PM]: at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Constructor .java:513) [11/6/11 5:31 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.Util.handleNewInstance(Util.java:406) [11/6/11 5:31 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.Util.getInstance(Util.java:381) [11/6/11 5:31 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createSQLException(SQLError.j ava:1015) [11/6/11 5:31 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createSQLException(SQLError.j ava:956) [11/6/11 5:31 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java: 3536) [11/6/11 5:31 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java: 3468) [11/6/11 5:31 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.sendCommand(MysqlIO.java:1957)
[11/6/11 5:31 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.sqlQueryDirect(MysqlIO.java:21 07) [11/6/11 5:31 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.execSQL(ConnectionImpl. java:2642) [11/6/11 5:31 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.execSQL(ConnectionImpl. java:2571) [11/6/11 5:31 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.StatementImpl.execute(StatementImpl.ja va:769) [11/6/11 5:31 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.StatementImpl.execute(StatementImpl.ja va:612) [11/6/11 5:31 PM]: at server.model.players.HiscoresHandler.saveHiscores(His coresHandler.java:90) [11/6/11 5:31 PM]: at server.model.players.HiscoresHandler.hiscoresHandler( HiscoresHandler.java:70) [11/6/11 5:31 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.logout(Client.java:1058) [11/6/11 5:31 PM]: at server.model.players.packets.ClickingButtons.processP acket(ClickingButtons.java:1883) [11/6/11 5:31 PM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(Pack etHandler.java:137) [11/6/11 5:31 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Clie nt.java:1895) [11/6/11 5:31 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:149) [11/6/11 5:31 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:164) [11/6/11 5:31 PM]: Game saved for player dark sait [11/6/11 5:31 PM]: [DEREGISTERED]: dark sait [/code]
Any help would be appreciated.

item.title: I need help with highscores. Rep ++
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

Your tables are set up a bit differently than mine. I had to change that which was a pain. I have 2 tables and you had one. the .execute had problems executing 2 queries at once for some reason. So that’s another issue I think. Were trying to get it to update 2 quires at once. I’ve seen batch commands, but I doubt that would work in this case. I’m stumped for now.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with highscores. Rep ++
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

This highscores is from imsuperman05.

This is what I have, I tweaked it a little bit from what it was.


private static synchronized void saveHiscores(final Client c) {
		try {
			int overallLVL = 0;
			double overallXP = 0;
			for (int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
				overallLVL += c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[i]);
				overallXP += c.playerXP[i];
			}
			if(c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3 || c.playerRights == 6) {
				System.out.println(c.playerName+" is a admin or owner and has not");
				System.out.println("been saved.");
				return;
			}
			HiscoresHandler
					.getConnection()
					.createStatement()
					.execute( 
							("INSERT INTO `skills` (`playerName`,`Attacklvl`,`Attackxp`,`Defencelvl`,`Defencexp`,`Strengthlvl`,`Strengthxp`,`Hitpointslvl`,`Hitpointsxp`,`Rangelvl`,`Rangexp`,`Prayerlvl`,`Prayerxp`,`Magiclvl`,`Magicxp`,`Cookinglvl`,`Cookingxp`,`Woodcuttinglvl`,`Woodcuttingxp`,`Fletchinglvl`,`Fletchingxp`,`Fishinglvl`,`Fishingxp`,`Firemakinglvl`,`Firemakingxp`,`Craftinglvl`,`Craftingxp`,`Smithinglvl`,`Smithingxp`,`Mininglvl`,`Miningxp`,`Herblorelvl`,`Herblorexp`,`Agilitylvl`,`Agilityxp`,`Thievinglvl`,`Thievingxp`,`Slayerlvl`,`Slayerxp`,`Farminglvl`,`Farmingxp`,`Runecraftlvl`,`Runecraftxp`) VALUES ('"+c.playerName+"',"+c.playerLevel[0]+","+c.playerXP[0]+","+c.playerLevel[1]+","+c.playerXP[1]+","+c.playerLevel[2]+","+c.playerXP[2]+","+c.playerLevel[3]+","+c.playerXP[3]+","+c.playerLevel[4]+","+c.playerXP[4]+","+c.playerLevel[5]+","+c.playerXP[5]+","+c.playerLevel[6]+","+c.playerXP[6]+","+c.playerLevel[7]+","+c.playerXP[7]+","+c.playerLevel[8]+","+c.playerXP[8]+","+c.playerLevel[9]+","+c.playerXP[9]+","+c.playerLevel[10]+","+c.playerXP[10]+","+c.playerLevel[11]+","+c.playerXP[11]+","+c.playerLevel[12]+","+c.playerXP[12]+","+c.playerLevel[13]+","+c.playerXP[13]+","+c.playerLevel[14]+","+c.playerXP[14]+","+c.playerLevel[15]+","+c.playerXP[15]+","+c.playerLevel[16]+","+c.playerXP[16]+","+c.playerLevel[17]+","+c.playerXP[17]+","+c.playerLevel[18]+","+c.playerXP[18]+","+c.playerLevel[19]+","+c.playerXP[19]+","+c.playerLevel[20]+","+c.playerXP[20]+")"));
				HiscoresHandler
					.getConnection()
					.createStatement()
					.execute(	
							("INSERT INTO `skillsoverall` (`playerName`,`lvl`,`xp`) VALUES ('"+c.playerName+"',"+(c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[7]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[8]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[9]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[10]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[11]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[12]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[13]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[14]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[15]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[16]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[17]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[18]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[19]) + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[20]))+","+((c.playerXP[0]) + (c.playerXP[1]) + (c.playerXP[2]) + (c.playerXP[3]) + (c.playerXP[4]) + (c.playerXP[5]) + (c.playerXP[6]) + (c.playerXP[7]) + (c.playerXP[8]) + (c.playerXP[9]) + (c.playerXP[10]) + (c.playerXP[11]) + (c.playerXP[12]) + (c.playerXP[13]) + (c.playerXP[14]) + (c.playerXP[15]) + (c.playerXP[16]) + (c.playerXP[17]) + (c.playerXP[18]) + (c.playerXP[19]) + (c.playerXP[20]))));
		
						
								
		} catch (final Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
	}

For some reason when a player that’s already been updated to the highscores it shows:

[11/6/11 5:31 PM]: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.MySQLIntegrityConstraintViola
tionException: Duplicate entry 'dark sait' for key 'PRIMARY'
[11/6/11 5:31 PM]:      at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance
0(Native Method)
[11/6/11 5:31 PM]:      at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance
(NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.java:39)
[11/6/11 5:31 PM]:      at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInst
ance(DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.java:27)
[11/6/11 5:31 PM]:      at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Constructor
.java:513)
[11/6/11 5:31 PM]:      at com.mysql.jdbc.Util.handleNewInstance(Util.java:406)
[11/6/11 5:31 PM]:      at com.mysql.jdbc.Util.getInstance(Util.java:381)
[11/6/11 5:31 PM]:      at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createSQLException(SQLError.j
ava:1015)
[11/6/11 5:31 PM]:      at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createSQLException(SQLError.j
ava:956)
[11/6/11 5:31 PM]:      at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java:
3536)
[11/6/11 5:31 PM]:      at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java:
3468)
[11/6/11 5:31 PM]:      at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.sendCommand(MysqlIO.java:1957)

[11/6/11 5:31 PM]:      at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.sqlQueryDirect(MysqlIO.java:21
07)
[11/6/11 5:31 PM]:      at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.execSQL(ConnectionImpl.
java:2642)
[11/6/11 5:31 PM]:      at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.execSQL(ConnectionImpl.
java:2571)
[11/6/11 5:31 PM]:      at com.mysql.jdbc.StatementImpl.execute(StatementImpl.ja
va:769)
[11/6/11 5:31 PM]:      at com.mysql.jdbc.StatementImpl.execute(StatementImpl.ja
va:612)
[11/6/11 5:31 PM]:      at server.model.players.HiscoresHandler.saveHiscores(His
coresHandler.java:90)
[11/6/11 5:31 PM]:      at server.model.players.HiscoresHandler.hiscoresHandler(
HiscoresHandler.java:70)
[11/6/11 5:31 PM]:      at server.model.players.Client.logout(Client.java:1058)
[11/6/11 5:31 PM]:      at server.model.players.packets.ClickingButtons.processP
acket(ClickingButtons.java:1883)
[11/6/11 5:31 PM]:      at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(Pack
etHandler.java:137)
[11/6/11 5:31 PM]:      at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Clie
nt.java:1895)
[11/6/11 5:31 PM]:      at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand
ler.java:149)
[11/6/11 5:31 PM]:      at server.Server.main(Server.java:164)
[11/6/11 5:31 PM]: Game saved for player dark sait
[11/6/11 5:31 PM]: [DEREGISTERED]: dark sait

Any help would be appreciated.
